strapiPost.title: XNA Takes Off Strong In 2023 Showing Impressive January Numbers
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas National Airport recorded 62,354 passengers in January, achieving the second-best January in the airport's history. 

  • Second to one: The only time the airport saw more boardings in January was in 2020, which boarded a total of 67,306 passengers.
  • New heights: XNA is poised for an even better Febraury and March, with new nonstop service to Phoenix and Orlando via Breeze Airways on the horizon.

Take off with FareFlightNWA for more information HERE.
